name: Wedge Antilles, Legendary Rogue
Lore: 'Highly decorated Corellian. Piloted Red 2 at the Battle of Yavin. A wealthy orphan, he bought a freighter with his inheritance.',
Text: 'Adds 3 to power of anything he pilots.  While piloting [A New Hope] Red 2: it gains [Nav Computer], it is maneuver and immunity to attrition +2, draws one battle destiny if not able to otherwise, and, if Wedge just forfeited, may use 1 Force to place him in Used Pile.',
